CatDescriptText: The advertisements in the storefront window read, " 'All My Friends Know Chesterfield is My Brand', Rita Hayworth" with a photograph of Ms. Hayworth and "Chesterfield The Champ of Cigarettes", with a photograph of Joe Louis holding a pack and one of him in the boxing ring.
TitMainTitle: Man offering another man a cigarette, standing in front of pharmacy advertising Chesterfield Cigarettes
